mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_ENUM ( F_ENUM_ID, F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_ENUM_NAME, F_ENCODE_STRING, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F_NOTE ) VALUES ( #{ enumId }, #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ enumName }, #{ encodeString }, #{ title }, #{ description }, #{ note } )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_ENUM SET F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }, F_ENUM_NAME = #{ enumName }, F_ENCODE_STRING = #{ encodeString }, F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F_NOTE = #{ note } WHERE F_ENUM_ID = #{ enumId }
mapper.select: SELECT F_ENUM_ID AS "enumId", F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", F_ENUM_NAME AS "enumName", F_ENCODE_STRING AS "encodeString", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note" FROM T_ENUM WHERE F_ENUM_ID = #{ enumId }

SELECT F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", F_TITLE AS "title", F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", F_NOTE AS "note", F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights" FROM T_PROJECT WHERE F_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }
